name: A.L.A.N. (itch) (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté)
description:
For Alex, the City of Xodias is not an ordinary town. This young boy is a Rift Breaker. He has the huge responsibility to fight the monsters spawning from Rifts, mysterious cracks of light only a handful of children can see. 

As a Rift Breaker, Alex possesses supernatural powers that’ll help him on his mission. Now, he and his friends Lily, Aime and Nana must protect the City of Xodias from monsters by destroying every single Rift they come across. 

A.L.A.N. is a short Visual Novel made in RPG MAKER MV.  It possesses light RPG elements, in the form of ATB-type battles.
